select
from tb_overtime_application_approved_opinion where eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isApproved = 0 order by orderBy

select
from tb_overtime_application_approved_opinion where oaid = #{oaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by orderBy desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_overtime_application_approved_opinion (oaaocid, oaaopid, oaid, eid, isApproved, opinion, orderBy, createtime, updatetime ) values (#{oaaocid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaaopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isapproved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now() )

update tb_overtime_application_approved_opinion
oaaopid = #{oaaopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
